logo.label: App Logo
logo.help: This is the logo that appears on the app

refresh_rate.label: Refresh Rate
refresh_rate.help: Minutes between refresh calls, defaults to 60 mins.

burn_in_guard_refresh_rate.label: Burn-in Guard Refresh Rate
burn_in_guard_refresh_rate.help: Minutes between refresh calls, defaults to 15 mins.

enable_plaato.label: Enable PLAATO
enable_plaato.help: Will add PLAATO key inputs to Tap Positions and check the API for values.
